briefdescription.para: Disable global IRQ with mask and return mstatus.

parameterdescription.para: mstatus value before irq mask is disabled
Threshold of IRQ can be serviced

briefdescription.para: Install ISR for certain IRQ for ram based vector table.
Uninstall ISR for certain IRQ for ram based vector table.
Enable global IRQ with mask for supervisor mode.
Disable global IRQ with mask and return sstatus for supervisor mode.

parameterdescription.para: sstatus value before irq mask is disabled

briefdescription.para: Restore global IRQ with mask for supervisor mode.
Disable IRQ from interrupt controller for supervisor mode.
Enable IRQ from interrupt controller for supervisor mode.
Enable machine timer IRQ for supervisor mode.
Enable software interrupt for supervisor mode.
Disable software interrupt for supervisor mode.
Trigger software interrupt for supervisor mode.
Complete software interrupt for supervisor mode.
Install ISR for certain IRQ for ram based vector table for supervisor mode.
Uninstall ISR for certain IRQ for ram based vector table for supervisor mode.
Switch mode to supervisor from machine.

parameterdescription.para: - entry point after mode is switched

memberdef.name: SAVE_CALLER_CONTEXT
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("addi sp, sp, %0" : : "i"(-CONTEXT_REG_NUM) :);\ __asm volatile("
\ c.swsp ra, 0*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t0, 1*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t1, 2*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t2, 3*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s1, 4*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a0, 5*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a1, 6*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a2, 7*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a3, 8*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a4, 9*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a5, 10*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a6, 11*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a7, 12*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s2, 13*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s3, 14*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s4, 15*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t3, 16*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t4, 17*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t5, 18*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t6, 19*4(sp)"); \ SAVE_FPU_CONTEXT(); \ }

briefdescription.para: Save the caller registers based on the RISC-V ABI specification.

memberdef.name: RESTORE_CALLER_CONTEXT
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("
\ c.lwsp ra, 0*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t0, 1*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t1, 2*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t2, 3*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s1, 4*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a0, 5*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a1, 6*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a2, 7*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a3, 8*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a4, 9*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a5, 10*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a6, 11*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a7, 12*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s2, 13*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s3, 14*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s4, 15*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t3, 16*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t4, 17*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t5, 18*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t6, 19*4(sp) 
");\ RESTORE_FPU_CONTEXT(); \ __asm volatile("addi sp, sp, %0" : : "i"(CONTEXT_REG_NUM) :);\ }

briefdescription.para: Restore the caller registers based on the RISC-V ABI specification.

memberdef.name: ENTER_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("
\ csrr s2, mepc 
\ csrr s3, mstatus 
");\ SAVE_FPU_STATE(); \ SAVE_DSP_CONTEXT(); \ __asm volatile("csrsi mstatus, 8"); \ }

memberdef.name: COMPLETE_IRQ_HANDLING_M
memberdef.initializer: { \ __asm volatile("csrci mstatus, 8"); \ __asm volatile("lui a4, 0xe4200"); \ __asm volatile("li a3, %0" : : "i" (irq_num) :); \ __asm volatile("sw a3, 4(a4)"); \ }

memberdef.name: EXIT_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("
\ csrw mstatus, s3 
\ csrw mepc, s2 
");\ RESTORE_FPU_STATE(); \ RESTORE_DSP_CONTEXT(); \ }

memberdef.name: NESTED_IRQ_ENTER
memberdef.initializer: SAVE_CSR(CSR_MEPC) \ SAVE_CSR(CSR_MSTATUS) \ SAVE_MXSTATUS() \ SAVE_FCSR() \ SAVE_UCODE() \ set_csr(CSR_MSTATUS, CSR_MSTATUS_MIE_MASK);

memberdef.name: SDK_DECLARE_EXT_ISR_M
memberdef.initializer: void isr(void) __attribute__((section(".isr_vector")));\ HPM_EXTERN_C HPM_ATTR_MACHINE_INTERRUPT void ISR_NAME_M(irq_num)(void);\ HPM_ATTR_MACHINE_INTERRUPT void ISR_NAME_M(irq_num)(void) \ { \ SAVE_CALLER_CONTEXT(); \ ENTER_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M();\ __asm volatile("la t1, %0\n\t" : : "i" (isr) : );\ __asm volatile("jalr t1\n");\ COMPLETE_IRQ_HANDLING_M(irq_num);\ EXIT_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M();\ RESTORE_CALLER_CONTEXT();\ __asm volatile("fence io, io");\ }

briefdescription.para: Declare an external interrupt handler for machine mode.

memberdef.name: MODE_SWITCH_FROM_M
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (label) { \ write_csr(mepc, label); \ } \ clear_csr(mstatus, CSR_MSTATUS_MPP_MASK); \ set_csr(mstatus, CSR_MSTATUS_MPP_SET(mode)); \ } while(0)

memberdef.name: MODE_SWITCH_FROM_M
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (label) { \ write_csr(mepc, label); \ } \ clear_csr(mstatus, CSR_MSTATUS_MPP_MASK); \ set_csr(mstatus, CSR_MSTATUS_MPP_SET(mode)); \ } while(0)

memberdef.name: SAVE_CALLER_CONTEXT
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("addi sp, sp, %0" : : "i"(-CONTEXT_REG_NUM) :);\ __asm volatile("
\ c.swsp ra, 0*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t0, 1*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t1, 2*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t2, 3*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s1, 4*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a0, 5*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a1, 6*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a2, 7*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a3, 8*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a4, 9*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a5, 10*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a6, 11*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp a7, 12*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s2, 13*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s3, 14*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp s4, 15*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t3, 16*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t4, 17*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t5, 18*4(sp) 
\ c.swsp t6, 19*4(sp)"); \ SAVE_FPU_CONTEXT(); \ }

briefdescription.para: Save the caller registers based on the RISC-V ABI specification.

memberdef.name: RESTORE_CALLER_CONTEXT
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("
\ c.lwsp ra, 0*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t0, 1*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t1, 2*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t2, 3*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s1, 4*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a0, 5*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a1, 6*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a2, 7*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a3, 8*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a4, 9*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a5, 10*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a6, 11*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp a7, 12*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s2, 13*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s3, 14*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp s4, 15*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t3, 16*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t4, 17*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t5, 18*4(sp) 
\ c.lwsp t6, 19*4(sp) 
");\ RESTORE_FPU_CONTEXT(); \ __asm volatile("addi sp, sp, %0" : : "i"(CONTEXT_REG_NUM) :);\ }

briefdescription.para: Restore the caller registers based on the RISC-V ABI specification.

memberdef.name: ENTER_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("
\ csrr s2, mepc 
\ csrr s3, mstatus 
");\ SAVE_FPU_STATE(); \ SAVE_DSP_CONTEXT(); \ __asm volatile("csrsi mstatus, 8"); \ }

memberdef.name: COMPLETE_IRQ_HANDLING_M
memberdef.initializer: { \ __asm volatile("csrci mstatus, 8"); \ __asm volatile("lui a4, 0xe4200"); \ __asm volatile("li a3, %0" : : "i" (irq_num) :); \ __asm volatile("sw a3, 4(a4)"); \ }

memberdef.name: EXIT_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ __asm volatile("
\ csrw mstatus, s3 
\ csrw mepc, s2 
");\ RESTORE_FPU_STATE(); \ RESTORE_DSP_CONTEXT(); \ }

memberdef.name: NESTED_IRQ_ENTER
memberdef.initializer: SAVE_CSR(CSR_MEPC) \ SAVE_CSR(CSR_MSTATUS) \ SAVE_MXSTATUS() \ SAVE_FCSR() \ SAVE_UCODE() \ set_csr(CSR_MSTATUS, CSR_MSTATUS_MIE_MASK);

memberdef.name: SDK_DECLARE_EXT_ISR_M
memberdef.initializer: void isr(void) __attribute__((section(".isr_vector")));\ HPM_EXTERN_C HPM_ATTR_MACHINE_INTERRUPT void ISR_NAME_M(irq_num)(void);\ HPM_ATTR_MACHINE_INTERRUPT void ISR_NAME_M(irq_num)(void) \ { \ SAVE_CALLER_CONTEXT(); \ ENTER_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M();\ __asm volatile("la t1, %0\n\t" : : "i" (isr) : );\ __asm volatile("jalr t1\n");\ COMPLETE_IRQ_HANDLING_M(irq_num);\ EXIT_NESTED_IRQ_HANDLING_M();\ RESTORE_CALLER_CONTEXT();\ __asm volatile("fence io, io");\ }
